title: GET SMART:S4 (Viva/Rpkg/DVD)
description: Wedding bells finally ring for Max and Agent 99 in Season 4 of this classic TV series. But first, Max has to escape from the clutches of KAOS, then he and 99 get stranded on a deserted island while on their honeymoon. Meanwhile, CONTROL agents are being kidnapped by KAOS and sent to a P.O.W. camp in New Jersey in the two-part episode 'The Not-So-Great Escape.' Look for James Caan, Don Rickles and Tom Bosley in guest appearances.
